title.value: Efficiency of herbicides application in seed-growing sowings of peas
Эффективность применения гербицидов в семеноводческих посевах овощного гороха

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Rybak, A.R., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Grodno Regional Inst. of Plant Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented results of researches on studying of methods of protection of seed-growing crops of field pea (Pisum arvense L.) from the weeds which have been carried out on the cespitose and podszolic sandy soil in the conditions of the western region of the Republic. Features of growth and development of plants of vegetable peas depending on applied methods of protection are defined. Effect of various herbicides on a contamination and efficiency of vegetable peas is studied. The protection system of pea seed crops from weeds, including treatment with Pivot in dose liter / ha in the 2-4 leaf stage of culture proved to be the most effective, as it provided the reduction of 90.6% weed kill and promoted to the formation of productivity at the level of 26.6 centners / ha and receiving of the net income at the level of USD 1833.4 / ha.
